DESCRIPTION: #yParry returns blocked damage, and #b2 #yParry can prevent #b1 unblocked damage.
When a Creature with #yScorch is attacked it takes damage equal to a quarter of their #yScorch and is reduced that much.
Put X random cards from your draw pile into your hand, discard them after you play a card.
Increases Healing from #yCure.
Spend X [${modID}:InspirationIcon] for an effect
When played verse cards are set aside attached to you until their #yCoda activates. NL Only your oldest #yVerse counts down each turn.
In X turns activate the following effect.
An effect each turn this #yVerse is set aside.
Whenever you take damage or lose HP deal damage to the attacker or a random enemy equal to your #yConfesison. NL If isn't your turn, reduce Confession by half.
Gained whenever you lose HP. Reduced by Half at the end of your turn. Every 5 Stigmata spent by Cure Increases Healing recieved by 1.
Recover recently lost HP.  NL Every #b5 HP recovered this way increase damage dealt & Healing from #yCure by #b1 for the rest of combat.
The number of cards in your hand and verses set aside.
Healing from #yCure in excess of recent wounds.
This relic only appears for slayers of Draconic Ancestry.
This card starts combat set aside and cannot be #rRemoved by standard means.
Retrieve a random set aside #yCantrip or #ySheathed card.
Set a card aside, retrieve it later when you #yFlourish.
Move the leftmost card in your hand to the right most position.
A Bonus effect if X or more cards are to the right of this.
Whenever a #yChilled creature takes unblocked Attack or Icicle damage, you gain #yBlock and Chill is reduced by #b1.
#yOrb : Deals damage to the last enemy you attacked. After being #yEvoked, if your next orb is an #yIcicle #yEvoke it.
#yOrb : Not effected by [dragonmod:FocusIcon] . NL Grants block and reduces block gained each turn, removes itself when gain equals zero. NL #yEvoke grants [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] .
#yOrb : Damages two random enemies each turn. #yEvoke : Gain a #yCrystal orb slot
When an Orb is Removed from a crystal orb slot, gain #b1 Temporary Focus and lose that orb slot.
A Bonus effect if the target of this card has the listed Debuff.
Activate the passive effect of your next orb.
#yBleeding creature lose HP at the start of your turn and lose all Bleed. NL #yBleeding creatures can't act if their #yBleed will kill them.
Subzero Increases the base damage of #yIcicle or #yHail orbs you channel by half your Subzero.

Applying #yLethargy instead raises it's duration to that amount. NL #yLethargy increases incoming damage from cards and orbs by 10% for each card played this turn, #yLethargy is reduced by #b1 each turn.

#yStance. Whenever you play an attack, deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand to a random enemy, up to 4, then reduce the maximum damage by 1. On Exit: gain 1 [dragonmod:AmethystBlossomIcon] .
#yStance. At the start of your turn, draw 2 extra cards, then reduce this amount by 1.  On Exit: gain 1 [dragonmod:AmberBlossomIcon] .
Transforms when you change stances, Amber if Dawn, Amethyst if Dusk.
Amber Blossom Increases the Maximum damage of Dawn stance.
Amethyst Blossom Increase the cards drawn by Dusk stance.
When you obtain #b3 Emerald Blossom gain [E] .
Hex Deals Dark damage over #b3 turns.
Create and Exhaust a copy of a card.
Removed until the end of combat. Does #rNot go to the exhaust pile but can be viewed there.
#yConjuring a card shuffles it from the #yExhaust pile into your draw pile it gains #yExhaust and #yBanishes when it enters the #yExhaust pile.
#yVanish effects occur when a card is removed from play.
If you are in a Stance, exit it and draw a card. NL Otherwise do the following.
#yEnchantment cards attach to the creature targeted for as long as it has #yCharges when played. Whenever the lingering effect of an #yenchantment activates, it loses a charge.
